name: Stress Relief Shooting Game: Smash & Blast Your Screen To Kill The Infestation!
name_original: Stress Relief Shooting Game: Smash & Blast Your Screen To Kill The Infestation!
description:
Download this epic screen destroyer game to annihilate your screen.

“Best Bug Game in the App Store.”

It’s your mission to inflict as much damage as possible! So choose your weapons wisely.

This is a fun free stress relief game. Choose your weapon and get busy destroying!

If it's been a tough day, let off some steam by selecting your own image (it could be your boss, your girlfriend or someone that's been annoying you) then picking up a weapon and let rip!

It's an interactive game that lets you decide what you need to in order wreak the maximum amount of damage. It’s your mission to inflict as much damage as you can!
